login_register_title: Not yet registered with the Medical Bureau?
login_register_description: If you are new to practicing in the region and do not yet have an entry with the Medical Bureau, you can apply for an entry here.
login_error_description: The email or password you entered is incorrect. Please try again.
login_error_pending_approval: Your account is pending approval. You will receive an email once it has been reviewed.
login_error_inactive: Your account is currently inactive. Please contact support for assistance.
forgot_password_dialog_desc: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.
forgot_password_success_toast: If an account exists for this email, a link to reset your password has been sent.
